cards.title: The Turf War
setup: At the start of the game, put {Calin} into play Ordained Herald side up, {Kanya} into play Crazed Experimenter side up, and {Sez} into play Gang Figurehead side up.
gameplay: At the start of the Villain turn, if there is only one Villain Leader in play, the heroes win, though a threat still lingers.
Whenever there are no Villain Leaders in play, the heroes win.
After an Environment card is destroyed, put it under the Leader with the most non-Leaders sharing a keyword with it.
At the end of the Villain turn, if any Villain Leader has at least 4 cards under them, flip this card.
flippedGameplay: At the start of the Villain turn, destroy 2 cards from under each Villain Leader.
Then, the Villain Leader with the most cards under it deals each other Leader and each non-Leader not sharing a keyword with it 2 Toxic Damage.
Then, reveal cards from the top of the Villain deck until you reveal a card sharing a keyword with that Villain Leader, play it, and shuffle the other cards back into the Villain Deck.
Whenever there are no Villain leaders in play, the heroes win.

openingLines.default: Ugh, heroes. Either pick a side or get out of the way.

cards.title: Calin
gameplay: At the end of the Villain turn, this card deals each target 1 Infernal Damage.
flippedGameplay: At the end of the Villain turn, if this card has at least 4 cards under it, destroy 4 cards under this card, flip this card and restore it to 20 HP.

cards.title: Kanya
gameplay: At the end of the Villain turn, this card deals each non-Minion target 2 Fire Damage.
flippedGameplay: At the end of the Villain turn, if this card has at least 3 cards under it, destroy 3 cards under this card and each non-Minion target deals themselves 3 Cold Damage.

cards.title: Sez
gameplay: At the end of the Villain turn, this card deals  the 5 non-Thug targets with the highest HP 3 Projectile Damage.
flippedGameplay: At the end of the Villain turn, if this card has at least 2 cards under it, destroy 2 cards under this card, each Thug regains 4 HP, and play the top card of the Environment deck.

cards.title: The Realm's Choice
cards.body: At the end of the Environment turn, destroy an Environment card, then play the top 2 cards of the Environment deck.
cards.flavorText: This city has been caught in the middle for long enough. The time has come for its people to choose.
